question: What is the name of the app which was developed by the five girls of Uttar Pradesh to connect the senior citizens in old-age homes with the children at orphanages?
explanation: The name of the app which was developed by the five girls of Uttar Pradesh to connect the senior citizens in old-age homes with the children at orphanages is Maitri. They have participated ‘Technovation challenge’ (The world’s largest technology and entrepreneurship programme for girls), in San Francisco and bagged bronze medals. The name of their team was “Tech Witches”.
